subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jenrry Mejia pitched seven scoreless innings as the Mets won the opener of a doubleheader. Later, Matt Harvey was sharp but was on the bench when the game was decided in the ninth.
snippet: Jenrry Mejia pitched seven scoreless innings as the Mets won the opener of a doubleheader. Later, Matt Harvey was sharp but was on the bench when the game was decided in the ninth.
